availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas A. Palmer (Mason County, Kentucky, wagon maker)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Tennessee native. Son of Pamelia Palmer. Married to Sabina Palmer in Mason County on September 12, 1861. Father of John Palmer and Frances Palmer. Student in Mason County in 1850. Wagon maker in Mason County in 1860. Wagon maker in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Mays Lick, p. 57A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Mays Lick, p. 59.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Mays Lick, p. 372A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1965), KDLA, Film #994027-994058: Mason County Marriages, p. 19 of 40 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), 9th Congressional District, Sub-district 6, KY, September 1863, vol. 2 of 3, p. 78 of 212 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, “Thomas A. Palmer (1836-1897)," Memorial # 5431436, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/110986247/thomas-a-palmer (accessed December 1, 2020).
